eu_methane_pneumatic_controller.description: Checks if facility has any low, intermittent, or high-bleed pneumatic devices.
eu_methane_pneumatic_controller.automated_check_scope: This is a partial, automated check. It only verifies compliance based on reported pneumatic device counts and emisisons from Subpart W. The full EPA regulation also allows for compliance by routing all emissions to a control device, a status which is not always available in public data and must be verified separately.
eu_methane_pneumatic_controller.output_if_compliant: Pneumatic controllers likely meet emissions standards.
eu_methane_pneumatic_controller.output_if_noncompliant: Action Required: (1) Unless emissions are for approved reasons, flaring and venting is not allowed. (2) Ensure that you are transitioning from any high, intermittent, low bleed controllers to zero emissions controllers.

eu_methane_routine_venting_flaring.description: Article 15 prohibits routine venting and flaring; only emergency or 'unavoidable & strictly necessary' events are allowed.

data_requirements.mt_CH4_pneumatics: Any CH4 field that represents uncontrolled emissions for this source group
data_requirements.storage_mt_CH4: Annual CH4 emissions from tanks without flares (mt CH4)
data_requirements.centrifugal_compressor_mt_ch4: Annual CH4 from centrifugal compressor vents

eu_methane_routine_venting_flaring.output_if_compliant: No uncontrolled CH4 - passes Article 15, subject to on-site confirmation that any flares are emergency-only.
eu_methane_routine_venting_flaring.output_if_noncompliant: Potential Article 15 breach: routine venting/flaring detected. Eliminate routine releases or prove 'unavoidable & strictly necessary' exemption.

eu_methane_flare_efficiency.description: New or retrofitted flares/combustors must have ≥99 % destruction & removal efficiency (DRE) and auto-igniter. All devices must meet this by 5 Feb 2026.
eu_methane_flare_efficiency.automated_check_scope: Advisory only - Subpart W does not contain DRE %. Flag sources that rely on flares for control so field teams can verify 99 % spec.
eu_methane_flare_efficiency.output_if_compliant: Flare present - verify ≥99 % DRE, auto-igniter, 15-day inspections, Article 17 compliance.
eu_methane_flare_efficiency.output_if_noncompliant: No flare/combustor data - if vapours are controlled some other way (VRU, process), ensure ≥99 % equivalence; if vapours are uncontrolled see Article 15 rule.

eu_methane_regulation_storage_tank.description: Any tank installed or refurbished after 5 Feb 2026 must be 'commercially available zero-emitting' where technically feasible.
eu_methane_regulation_storage_tank.automated_check_scope: Screening heuristic: if facility start-up year ≥2026 **and** uncontrolled CH₄ > 0, flag for Article 15 §7 review.

data_requirements.count_tanks_vented: Number of Storage Tanks that Vented Gas

eu_methane_regulation_storage_tank.output_if_compliant: Pre-2026 install or zero-emitting design indicated. Verify design specs.
eu_methane_regulation_storage_tank.output_if_noncompliant: New/refurbished tank vents CH4 - install zero-emitting design or prove technical infeasibility (Art 15 §7).
